otrs_config:
$Id: iPhone.xml,v 1.8 2010/07/08 03:29:59 cr Exp $
If you want to log all communication between iPhone and otrs. Wenn Sie die gesamte Kommunikation zwischen iPhone und OTRS log. iPhone Core::Log
No
Yes
You have to specify a logfile (for the debug log). The file will be created by the system, if it doesn't exist. Muss eine Logdatei angegeben werden. Diese wird automatisch vom System angelegt, falls sie noch nicht existiert. iPhone Core::Log
/tmp/iPhone.log
If you want to set the ticket type (Ticket::Type needs to be activated). Wenn der Ticket-Typ gesetzt werden soll (Ticket::Type muss aktiv sein). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
If you want to set the service (Ticket::Service needs to be activated). Wenn der Service gesetzt werden soll (Ticket::Service muss aktiv sein). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
If you want to set the owner. Wenn der Besitzer gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
If you want to set the responsible (Ticket::Responsible needs to be activated). Wenn der Verantwortliche gesetzt werden soll (Ticket::Responsible muss aktiv sein). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
If you want to set the CustomerID. Wenn der CustomerID gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
If you want to set the state of a ticket. Wenn der zustand gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes
Default next state. Standardmäßig ausgewählter nächster Status. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
open
Default priority options. Default Auswahl der Priorität. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
3 normal
Sets the default article type for new phone tickets in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
phone
Sets the default sender type for new phone ticket in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
customer
If you want to set the time units of a ticket. Wenn die zeiteinheiten gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes

Defines the history type for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
PhoneCallCustomer
Defines the history comment for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
Required permissions to use the ticket note screen in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
note
Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket note screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
If you want to set the ticket type (Ticket::Type needs to be activated). Wenn der Ticket-Typ gesetzt werden soll (Ticket::Type muss aktiv sein). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
If you want to set the service (Ticket::Service needs to be activated). Wenn der Service gesetzt werden soll (Ticket::Service muss aktiv sein). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
If you want to set the owner. Wenn der Besitzer gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
If you want to set the responsible. Wenn der Verantwortliche gesetzt werden soll. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
Would you like to set the state of a ticket if a note is created by an agent? Soll der Status eines Tickets gesetzt werden können, wenn eine Notiz durch einen Agent angelegt wird? iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
Default next states after adding a note. Nächstmögliche Status nach dem Hinzufügen einer Notiz. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
open
closed
pending reminder
pending auto
Default next state. Standardmäßig ausgewählter nächster Status. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
open
Show note fields. Eingabemöglichkeit für Notiz. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
No
Yes
Default note subject (This option will be translated). Standardtext im Betreff einer Notiz. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
Note
Default note text. Standardtext im Textfeld einer Notiz. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
Default note type. Voreingestellter Notiztyp. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
note-internal
Specify the different note types, that you want to use in your system. Hier können die verschiedenen Notiz-Typen festgelegt werden, die innerhalb des Systems verwendet werden sollen. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
1
1
0
Show priority options. Möglichkeit der Auswahl für die Priorität. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote

Yes

Show title fields. Eingabemöglichkeit für Title. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote

Yes

Required permissions to use the close ticket screen in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
close
Defines if a ticket lock is required in the close ticket screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes
Sets the ticket type in the close ticket screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes
Sets the service in the close ticket screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes

No
Yes
Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes
If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes
Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
closed
Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
closed successful
Allows adding notes in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
No
Yes
Sets the default subject for notes added in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
Close
Sets the default body text for notes added in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
Defines the default type of the note in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
note-internal
Specifies the different note types that will be used in the system. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewClose
1
0
0

Required permissions to use the ticket compose screen in the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
compose
Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes
If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket if it is composed / answered in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes
Defines the default next state of a ticket if it is composed / answered in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
open
Defines the next possible states after composing / answering a ticket in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
open
closed
pending auto
pending reminder
Defines the format of responses in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface ($QData{"OrigFrom"} is From 1:1, $QData{"OrigFromName"} is only realname of From). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
$QData{"Salutation"} $TimeShort{"$QData{"Created"}"} - $QData{"OrigFromName"} $Text{"wrote"}: $QData{"Body"}
$QData{"StdResponse"}
$QData{"Signature"}
Defines the used character for email quotes in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
>
Adds customers email addresses to recipients in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes
Replaces the original sender with current customer's email address on compose answer in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes
Uses Cc recipients in reply Cc list on compose an email answer in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes
